abstract: In the latest Nigerian e-mail scam, the crooks are taking a page from Facebook and leveraging the power of social connections.
snippet: In the latest Nigerian e-mail scam, the crooks are taking a page from Facebook and leveraging the power of social connections.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria continues to develop and export the world’s most innovative Internet scams. In one bizarre variation that seems to have ramped up in recent months, the scammers are taking a page from Facebook and leveraging the power of social connections.

headline.main: E-Mail Scammers Ask Your Friends for Money
